title: Himi 492
lyrics:
M.L.
(I Kolinito 5:7,8)
1.
Kuo feia hotau Lami,
Sīsū ko hotau Pāsova;
Tau hanga leva ai ‘o pani
He toto ‘i he matapā.
2.
‘Afuhi hotau loto mu’a,
Hu’anga ia ‘o e kovi,
‘Ai ki he ngaahi me’a ‘i tu’a
Ke tapu hotau ‘api foki.
3.
Ko hotau fakahao ia
He houhau ‘a hotau ‘Otua;
Pea ka ‘eke ‘etau hia,
Lākai he ‘āngelo faka’auha.
4.
Pea tau fai ‘a e kātoanga,
Kuo tala hotau vete ange;
Ha’aki ‘a e fili kāfakafa,
Huhu’i hotau hopoate.
5.
Tafi ‘a e lēvani ki tu’a,
Me’akai fo’ou pē kuo ‘omi,
Sino he Lami ‘a e ‘Otua
Kuo tafa ma’a ‘etau tokoni.
6.
Tu’u pe ‘o kai kuo ‘osi teu
Ke kumi ‘a e fonua lelei;
Huke ‘a e vala, ‘ai ‘a e sū,
He ko e fai fononga eni.
7.
Hu’i kotoa pē ‘o li’aki
‘A e kofu fakalielia.
Ko e fuluveli ‘oku fai,
Kuo ‘osi ‘etau ongosia.
8.
Tau fakamālō ki he ‘Eiki
He ngāue lahi kuo fai;
Pea tau ‘alu pilikimi
Ke kumi hotau Kēnani.*
